item.title: Frontal lobe
item.description: The frontal lobe is responsible for: planning thinking memory prefer action and decision making evaluation of emotions and situations memory of learned motor activities, e.

item.title: Limbic system
item.description: Limbic system is responsible for: regulating behavior related to emotions certain emotional states (for example, feelings of bliss ([[Productivity/Basics/Reward system]]), frustration, fear, contentment) memory and [[Productivity/Basics/Motivation]] processes the center of smell.
